dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA - notice of copyright infringement]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 18, 2005 6:13 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA - notice of copyright infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------

X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000

1DNesN-0007kU-Lx        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Mon, 18 Apr 2005
17:37:55 -0500

helo=lili.theplanet.com)        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id
1DNesJ-000Jxu-Le
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Mon, 18 Apr 2005 17:37:55 -0500

mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50)        id
1DNesG-0007j7-VD        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 18 Apr 2005 17:37:49
-0500

id

<abuse@theplanet.com>; Mon, 18 Apr 2005 17:37:22 -0500 (CDT)
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5.7226.0
Content-class: urn:content-classes:message
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain;        charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Date: Mon, 18 Apr 2005 17:37:21 -0500
Message-ID: <9A8EFDB8A197B8478D3FFE26E86C16DF500792@chexch.playboy.com>
X-MS-Has-Attach:
X-MS-TNEF-Correlator:
Thread-Topic: DMCA - notice of copyright infringement
Thread-Index: AcVEZy8lCEQ92CUQSYidNVJv2Olt7A==
X-Priority: 1
Priority: Urgent
Importance: high
From: Ball, Mary <MBall@playboy.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
X-Virus-Scanned: by amavisd-new(tky/chicago) at playboy.com
Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of playboy.com
designates 216.163.143.4 as permitted sender)        client-ip=216.163.143.4;
envelope-from=MBall@playboy.com;        helo=mx.chi.playboy.com;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.6
Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA - notice of copyright infringement
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.6

April 18, 2005

The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207
abuse@theplanet.com

Dear Sir or Madam:

It has been brought to our attention that web pages at www.heaven666.org
(70.85.110.106) display, without authorization, reproductions of images
owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. ("Playboy"). All right,
title and interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy.

I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on
www.heaven666.org (70.85.110.106) are not authorized by the copyright owner,
its agent or the law.

Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy
copyrighted images on www.heaven666.org (70.85.110.106) and on all web pages
under your control.

Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following links:

<http://www.heaven666.org/celeb.php?d=teri%20polo%20playboy%20pictures>
<http://www.heaven666.org/celebs/teri%20polo%20playboy%20pictures/teri-polo-
1.jpg>
<http://www.heaven666.org/celebs/teri%20polo%20playboy%20pictures/teri-polo-
8.jpg>
<http://www.heaven666.org/celebs/teri%20polo%20playboy%20pictures/teri-polo-
6.jpg>
<http://www.heaven666.org/celebs/teri%20polo%20playboy%20pictures/teri-polo-
7.jpg>
<http://www.heaven666.org/celebs/teri%20polo%20playboy%20pictures/teri-polo-
3.jpg>
<http://www.heaven666.org/celebs/teri%20polo%20playboy%20pictures/teri-polo-
4.jpg>
<http://www.heaven666.org/celebs/teri%20polo%20playboy%20pictures/teri-polo-
5.jpg>
<http://www.heaven666.org/celebs/teri%20polo%20playboy%20pictures/teri-polo-
2.jpg>

I, Mary Ball, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on behalf of
Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the above-mentioned
unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted images.  My contact
information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises International, Inc., 680 N.
Lakeshore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611, Fax 312-266-2042, phone
312-751-8000, E-mail address is mball@playboy.com.

We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter immediately.

This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any rights
and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or otherwise.  Any and
all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved.

PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC.

Mary Ball
Senior Manager, Intellectual Property Enforcement

cc:  Ana Cashman, Esq.



Mary Ball
Senior Manager, Intellectual Property Enforcement Playboy Enterprises
International, Inc.

- ---
This email message is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may
contain confidential and privileged information.  Any unauthorized review,
use, disclosure or distribution is prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all copies
of the original message.  If you are the intended recipient, please be
advised that the content of this message is subject to access, review and
disclosure by the sender's Email System Administrator.





- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
